attributes.action: Lift the Saturday 3pm ban on football,  make all UK football available in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Football subscription services are getting too expensive as a collective especially when they don't show all games live. The capability to do so is there as other countries can view ALL English football and cheaper.
attributes.background:
Lift the tv blanket ban on 3pm Saturday football kickoffs. 
Make all UK based football live to watch in the UK for more affordable prices

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about when to hold and broadcast football matches are a matter for the FA, the Premier League and the Football League, and broadcasters, not the Government or House of Commons.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.
